public class LabelValue
extends LabelEntry

This widget displays a label and a string value.

LabelValue

public LabelValue(java.lang.String labelText,
                  java.lang.String valueText,
                  boolean labelAtLeft)
Constructor.
Parameters:
labelText - The text to display in the label.
valueText - The value string to display next to the label.
labelAtLeft - True if the label should be displayed at the left, otherwise the label will be at the top.
